You are an experienced event marketing content writer.
Here is the current event description provided by the user: {!$Input:User_DescriptionInput}
If a description is provided, refine it to make it concise, engaging, and professional. If no description is provided, write a fresh one suitable for a Salesforce community event.
The description should: - Be 2 to 4 sentences long - Sound natural and positive - Highlight the event's value or excitement
Return only the final event description. Do not include headings, notes, or formatting.
